name: Angel, Kalkydra
movement: walk 40 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 90 ft.
description: The Kalkydra is a Huge celestial creature known for its immense power and formidable presence in combat, characterized by its radiant energy and physical prowess.
memorable: The Kalkydra's ability to deal significant radiant damage while providing magical support to allies, along with its Solar Nimbus reaction, makes it a uniquely challenging opponent.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and serve its celestial purpose, possibly defending realms or aiding allies.
relations: Potentially related to other celestial beings and might serve greater celestial powers or entities.
environment: Commonly found in celestial realms or areas of significant light and energy.
strengths: High hit points and armor class, combined with magical resistance and devastating radiant attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to tactics that can exploit its slower Dexterity and lack of high bonuses in saving throws against non-magical effects.
attacks: Multiattack with Bites or Sunrays, grappling with Constrict, and powerful ranged attacks dealing radiant and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Angelic Weapons enhances its attacks with additional radiant damage, making each blow potentially devastating.
senses: The Kalkydra possesses truesight out to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and darkness.
skills: Has proficient perception skills, giving it a passive Perception score of 20, allowing it to be highly aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Immortal Nature allows it to function without food, drink, or sleep.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Song of Sunrise fills a large area with sunlight, affecting vulnerable creatures.
Solar Nimbus reacts to attacks, dealing fire and radiant damage to those who hit it.
It communicates telepathically with a range of 120 feet.
spellcasting: Casts spells using Charisma with a save DC of 19, able to cast spells like Detect Evil and Good at will, and has a selection of powerful spells including Greater Restoration.
